comment.author: 19909418@N05
comment._content:
A beautiful photo!  

But not surprising, as this was reportedly taken by the renowned war photographer Hugo Wilmar.  While being considered the first -- or, maybe, only -- to document events from the side of the Indonesians, thereby showing the real, ugly face of the 'conflict', a shot like this makes me think that he must have loved that country  :-)
